HomePage.subtitle: Full-stack Web Developer
HomePage.description: Hello friends! You can call me Zydhan. I'm web development enthusiast with 2 year of experiences and currently study to become Bachelor of Informatics Engineering at Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology Surabaya.

dptsi_fullstack.title: Full-stack Web Developer Intern
dptsi_fullstack.description: I was offered by a lecturer acting as the director of DPTSI - Directorate of Information Technology Services at Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology Surabaya.
